Save game feature: planned
Telnet: planned
Loop option: What do you mean? What "loop option"??
Sending messages to other players: You can speak to other players as usual. You could easily build in a system of your own to let players speak to other players anywhere in the game. In one line, maybe "command <message #player# #message#> msgto <#player#; #message#>"
Build maps in game: Just as you do in normal Quest, using "create" and changing properties.
